rooms.description: A welcoming area with ample natural light; designed to adhere to Vastu principles by orienting the entrance facing east.
Spacious living space featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for maximum natural light and ventilation. The design incorporates energy-efficient glazing and passive solar heating.
Compact but functional kitchen with energy-saving appliances and integrated storage. Oriented to the north for optimal sunlight and airflow in line with Vastu norms.
Adjacent to the kitchen, designed as a multipurpose space, promoting family interaction while adhering to eco-friendly and budget-conscious design principles.
Small utility area for appliances and storage; efficiently planned to reduce costs while providing essential functionalities.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows installed with energy-efficient glass to maximize natural lighting and ventilation, reducing electricity usage.
A durable, cost-effective door that complies with local building norms while ensuring security and ease of access.

rooms.description: Largest bedroom on the first floor with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows oriented per Vastu (preferably south-facing). Includes built-in storage to maximize space efficiency.
A comfortable guest bedroom with eco-friendly materials and sound insulation for privacy; designed keeping budget constraints in mind.
Shared bathroom on the first floor for both bedrooms. Utilizes water-saving fixtures and efficient plumbing to adhere to eco-friendly standards and local regulations.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows with energy-efficient glazing, enhancing natural light and reducing cooling/heating costs in compliance with Vastu principles.
Provides access to a small balcony for fresh air; designed as an eco-friendly feature and to meet local building norms.

rooms.description: Multipurpose room serving as additional living space or home office. Features floor-to-ceiling windows to maintain consistency with the eco-friendly design and Vastu principles of light distribution.

Dedicated swimming pool zone on the second floor. The pool is designed with safety features and eco-friendly water recycling systems; integrated into the building structure while considering budget constraints.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring ample natural lighting and ventilation, aligned with both Vastu principles and energy efficiency standards.
Elevated walkway to the pool area, designed for safety and ease of access; constructed using cost-effective materials that comply with local building norms.

notes.eco_friendly: The design emphasizes energy efficiency through floor-to-ceiling windows, passive solar heating, and water-saving fixtures.
notes.vastu_considerations: Room orientations are planned to maximize natural light, airflow, and positive energy flow in accordance with Vastu Shastra.
notes.budget_constraints: Materials and space utilization have been carefully optimized for cost-effectiveness without compromising on sustainability or comfort.
